title: Digital Drawing Learning Course for Technology-Enhanced Anatomy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Anatomy Terminology and Understanding of Human Body Structure
context.additional_context: A practical anatomy education program for working professionals, emphasizing visualization learning through digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately represent over 10 major human body organs using digital drawing tools within four weeks.
Learners can correctly apply 50 anatomical terms in practical document writing.
Learners can recall over 80% of learning content during evaluations one week later using digital content (screencasts).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
